Members

Members

Below are active members of the Quantum Programming Community. Each profile includes contact links, research interests, and contributions.

Organizers

John Ye — UCLA

Area: Quantum Systems & Error Correction

Webpage: https://yezhuoyang.github.io/

John works on scalable quantum error-correction infrastructure, helper-qubit-aware scheduling, and logical error-rate estimation methodologies for large-scale quantum processors.

Jens Palsberg — Professor, UCLA

Webpage: https://web.cs.ucla.edu/~palsberg/

Jens Palsberg is the faculty advisor of QuBruin.

Core members

Aarav Pabla — UCLA

Area: Quantum Systems & Error Correction

Webpage: https://github.com/apabla1

Aarav is interested in adapting fault-tolerant schemes for scalable quantum computing. He works on efficient quantum LDPC architectures and robust implementations of fault-tolerant protocols in the presence of realistic hardware noise.
